Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.locking

Interface Locks.Client

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ResourceLocker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunityLockClient, NoOpClient
    Enclosing interface:
    Locks
    public static interface Locks.Client
extends ResourceLocker, AutoCloseable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static long INVALID_TRANSACTION_ID
      Invalid transaction id that lock clients using before they are initialised or after close
      static int NO_LOCK_SESSION_ID
      Represents the fact that no lock session is used because no locks are taken.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize​(LeaseClient leaseClient,
                long transactionId)
        Initializes this locks client with a LeaseClient for the owning transaction. Must be called before any lock can be acquired. An lease that has become invalid can abort a transaction midway.
        Parameters:
        leaseClient - LeaseClient of the owning transaction.
        transactionId - lock client owning transaction id

      • acquireShared

        void acquireShared​(LockTracer tracer,
                   ResourceType resourceType,
                   long... resourceIds)
            throws AcquireLockTimeoutException
        Can be grabbed when there are no locks or only share locks on a resource. If the lock cannot be acquired, behavior is specified by the WaitStrategy for the given ResourceType.
        Parameters:
        tracer - a tracer for listening on lock events.
        resourceType - type or resource(s) to lock.
        resourceIds - id(s) of resources to lock. Multiple ids should be ordered consistently by all callers
        Throws:
        AcquireLockTimeoutException

      • acquireExclusive

        void acquireExclusive​(LockTracer tracer,
                      ResourceType resourceType,
                      long... resourceIds)
               throws AcquireLockTimeoutException
        Description copied from interface: ResourceLocker
        Can be grabbed when no other client holds locks on the relevant resources. No other clients can hold locks while one client holds an exclusive lock. If the lock cannot be acquired, behavior is specified by the WaitStrategy for the given ResourceType.
        Specified by:
        acquireExclusive in interface ResourceLocker
        Parameters:
        tracer - lock tracer
        resourceType - type or resource(s) to lock.
        resourceIds - id(s) of resources to lock. Multiple ids should be ordered consistently by all callers
        Throws:
        AcquireLockTimeoutException - in case of timeout

      • tryExclusiveLock

        boolean tryExclusiveLock​(ResourceType resourceType,
                         long resourceId)
        Try grabbing exclusive lock, not waiting and returning a boolean indicating if we got the lock.

      • trySharedLock

        boolean trySharedLock​(ResourceType resourceType,
                      long resourceId)
        Try grabbing shared lock, not waiting and returning a boolean indicating if we got the lock.

      • releaseExclusive

        void releaseExclusive​(ResourceType resourceType,
                      long... resourceIds)
        Release a set of exclusive locks

      • prepare

        void prepare()
        Start preparing this transaction for committing. In two-phase locking palace, we will in principle no longer be acquiring any new locks - though we still allow it because it is useful in certain technical situations - but when we are ready, we will start releasing them. This also means that we will no longer accept being asynchronously stopped. From this point on, only the commit process can decide if the transaction lives or dies, and in either case, the lock client will end up releasing all locks via the close() method.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop all active lock waiters and release them. All new attempts to acquire any locks will cause exceptions. This client can and should only be closed afterwards. If this client has been prepared, then all currently acquired locks will remain held, otherwise they will be released immediately.

      • close

        void close()
        Releases all locks, using the client after calling this is undefined.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • getLockSessionId

        int getLockSessionId()

      • activeLocks

        Stream<ActiveLock> activeLocks()

      • activeLockCount

        long activeLockCount()
